website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a Joy-Con wheel for adults, this is the best you're going to find.
pros: Officially licensed by Nintendo and comes in both Mario and Luigi designs
Features rubber grips on the sides for extra comfort
Wider design is better for bigger hands
cons: Only comes with 1 wheel while most others come with 2

customer_reviews.title: Buy it. Really its perfect for Mario Kart
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to motion controls the Switch is amazing. You won't experience it well with an inferior small plastic wheel. The Mario wheel is larger than anyother for the Switch and is of higher quality plastic as well. Simply it holds up to childrens destruction attempts. Removing the joycons is easy enough for a toddler and the fit is snug as well. Control is excellent. My 3yo is far better with the wheel than a joystick. The triggers work well, and the steering is easy for adults and small children. This is an incredibly fun way to play and accurate. Kids love it and it works well for adults too. Mario and Luigi wheels exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Yes the size fits perfectly. Bigger than the first double pack. That [1st one released] wheel fit within the inner side of the wheel itself. I also have the Luigi [green] version. The rubber grip makes holding it more comfortable and handling feel even more precise. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: ShinMadman3rd

customer_reviews.title: Fun addition to Mario Kart
customer_reviews.text: I bought my husband the Luigi wheel for Christmas (the Mario wheel was picked up on another site since it was sold out on here). We use both whenever we play Mario Kart on the Switch and it really gives you the "driving" experience and I think it's easier to control your character. I love the Mario/Luigi colors and logos and that the wheels are larger in size than other wheels out there. The down side is that our kids often want to grab the wheels from us to play with and we get last place from the distraction. It's a hit with everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Maria M.

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: You only get one!
customer_reviews.text: This is a rip-off for the money as you only get one! For the about the same amount you can get the actual Nintendo ones, or similar brands where you get 2. My fault for assuming this was a good deal and I was getting 2. Also keep in mind these do nothing but hold the controllers and they are small you don’t really get any better feel or control.

product_meta.title: HORI Nintendo Switch Mario Kart 8 Deluxe Wheel (Mario Version) Officially Licensed By Nintendo - Nintendo Switch
product_meta.description: Style:Mario| Configuration:SingleOfficially Licensed by Nintendo. Blaze through Mario Kart 8 deluxe's exciting courses with this full-sized Premium racing wheel attachment. Simply pop your Nintendo Switch Joy-Con Controller (sold separately) into the racing wheel attachment and enjoy more realistic control and better grip. A larger sized wheel for better control, complimented by a luxurious rubber grip and large and responsive shoulder buttons sets this racing wheel apart from the rest. Mario themed colors and Logos, this racing wheel is perfect for Mario Kart fans! Officially Licensed by Nintendo.
feature_bullets: Mario themed racing wheel attachment for the Switch Joy-Con
